page.title: 02Domesday Walk, Hereford.
page.content: Our class divided into 4 groups of 5 or 6 with an adult and each group had 3 streets to examine.My group left school at 9.30.a.m. We carried a board, a tally sheet for each street and a list of reference numbers. We took turns to mark off the use of each building.We went through the subway and saw the tiles marking the line of the ancient City Ditch. We looked at{Aubrey St.,Berrington {St.}and{Little Berrington St.}We saw almshouses, hotels, shops, offices, garages and carparks. We entered them on the tally sheet and checked the list for the number. It took an hour. Then we walked up{Victoria St.}to look at the cannonball in the City wall. Back at school we added the totals for all the streets together to enter them into the computer.
